text: lifting 4kg dumb bells and heavy weights for two hours a day would be an impressive fitness regime for an adult . but the gruelling sessions are in actual fact exercises for a pair of romanian brothers who part of a family dubbed ` the hercules ' . giuliano stroe , aged nine , and his seven-year-old brother claudiu hit the headlines as they trained to be the world 's strongest boys in a family of bodybuilders . now the family could be on their way to britain after falling on hard times in their homeland and struggling to find the fame and fortune they hoped would await them while summary: giuliano stroe , 9 , and his brother claudiu , 7 , want to be bodybuilders .   lift weights for two hours every day to build up arm and chest strength .   father iulian , 35 , moved them to florence to find their fame and fortune .   the plan failed so they had to return to scrap metal dealing in romania .   now they hope to move to britain to bring their act to a new audience .
